Package montecarlo

Class MonteCarloSimulation

  • java.lang.Object
    • montecarlo.MonteCarloSimulation
  • public class MonteCarloSimulation
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides methods for simple Monte Carlo simulations.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static void simulateNRuns​(Experiment exp, long n, java.util.Random rnd, StatCollector stat)
      Simulates experiment exp n times, using rnd as a source of pseudo-random numbers and collect the results in stat.
      static void simulateTillGivenCIHalfWidth​(Experiment exp, double maxHalfWidth, long initialNumberOfRuns, long additionalNumberOfRuns, java.util.Random rnd, StatCollector stat)
      First simulates experiment exp initialNumberOfRuns times, then estimates the number of runs needed for a 95% confidence interval half width no more than maxHalfWidth.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • simulateNRuns

        public static void simulateNRuns​(Experiment exp,
                                 long n,
                                 java.util.Random rnd,
                                 StatCollector stat)
        Simulates experiment exp n times, using rnd as a source of pseudo-random numbers and collect the results in stat.
        Parameters:
        exp - experiment to be run each time
        n - number of runs to be performed
        rnd - random source to be used to simulate the experiment
        stat - collector to be used to collect the results of each experiment

      • simulateTillGivenCIHalfWidth

        public static void simulateTillGivenCIHalfWidth​(Experiment exp,
                                                double maxHalfWidth,
                                                long initialNumberOfRuns,
                                                long additionalNumberOfRuns,
                                                java.util.Random rnd,
                                                StatCollector stat)
        First simulates experiment exp initialNumberOfRuns times, then estimates the number of runs needed for a 95% confidence interval half width no more than maxHalfWidth. If final C.I. is too wide, simulates additionalNumberOfRuns before recalculating the C.I. and repeats the process as many times as needed.

        Uses rnd as a source of pseudo-random numbers and collects the results in stat.

        Parameters:
        exp - experiment to be run each time
        maxHalfWidth - maximal half width of the confidence interval
        initialNumberOfRuns - initial number of runs to be performed
        additionalNumberOfRuns - additional number of runs to be performed if C.I. is too wide
        rnd - random source to be used to simulate the experiment
        stat - collector to be used to collect the results of each experiment
